AoA Level 1.effect: Increases All-out Attack damage output to level 1

AoA Level 2.effect: Increases All-out Attack damage output to level 2

AoA Level 3.effect: Increases All-out Attack damage output to level 3

AoA Level 4.effect: Increases All-out Attack damage output to level 4

AoA Level 5.effect: Increases All-out Attack damage output to max level

Burning Petals.effect: Deals severe Fire damage to all foes

Complete Analysis.effect: Reveals all elemental affinities on all enemies

Dragon Hustle.effect: Increases Attack, Defense, and Hit/Evasion rates for 3 turns (party)

Enemy Radar.effect: Reveal the location of Shadows on each floor over a wide area

Full Analysis.effect: Reveal an enemy's stats, weak points, and skills (Excludes Bosses)

Kamui Miracle.effect: Anything could happen... All allies and/or all foes' HP and SP fully recovered. All allies and/or all foes downed. All allies and/or all foes inflicted with random status ailment. Nothing

Shield of Justice.effect: Shields the party from all damage once

The Man's Way.effect: Chance of causing Down and Dizzy to all foes

Third Eye.effect: Reveal the effectiveness of an attack (after target has been attacked with the same affinity)

Treasure Radar.effect: Reveal the location of treasure chests on each floor

Weakness Scan.effect: Reveal an enemy's affinity at the start of battle (weakness or immunity)

Youthful Wind.effect: Moderately restores HP and increases Hit/Evasion rates for 3 turns (party)
